sys_openapi_operation.name: GET /keys/{key}
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation: {"fName":"GET /keys/{key}","fOperationId":"GETgetPrivilegesOfKey","fDescription":"The user id and privileges of the given API key.","fPath":"/keys/{key}","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"OK","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"304","fDescription":"Not Modified","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"Bad Request","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"key","fDescription":"The zotero API key. It is a key to which bearer you\u0027ll grant permission to write in the user or group library. \u003ca href\u003d\"https://www.zotero.org/settings/keys\" target\u003d\"blank\"\u003eThis key can be created or found in your settings\u003c/a\u003e (it is called \"private key\").\u003cbr/\u003eFor the swaggerui user it is 7f1iVhE5D2GHVkRYwpSszGUA","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"key0582711076","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDefault":"7f1iVhE5D2GHVkRYwpSszGUA","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}
